page_content:
**Relevant Ghanaian policies**

- [(a) Mapping of national targets to the Aichi Biodiversity Targets](https://www.cbd.int/countries/targets/?country=gh). This contains Ghana’s National Targets and the Action Pans to integrate ecosystem and biodiversity values into national and local planning, development processes, poverty reduction strategies and accounts in accordance with the Aichi Biodiversity Targets.
- [(b) National Biodiversity Strategy and Action Plan](https://www.cbd.int/doc/world/gh/gh-nbsap-v2-en.pdf). Ghana has successfully integrated biodiversity values into its national accounting and reporting systems as part of the implementation of the nation’s System of Environmental-Economic Accounting.
